The ninth of the Quranic researcher: His Exalted: And we do not know the evil I want in the earth or did they want their Lord to be guided and in which they say: One of them is that I do not Raqqaqa is the evil that I want in the people of the earth or good and good.The second: We do not know that the intended from sending Muhammad, who has a prohibition from the burning is that they deny it, so they will be destroyed, as they are the one who lied to the nations.
